'''Scattered Ruins''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] unlocked after completing {{Quest|Into the Sunlight}}. Players can relive their duel with [[The Knave]] and obtain rewards.

==Enemies==
{{Card|The Knave|type=Enemy|caption=1}}

==Rules==
{{Transclude|Domain|trouncerule|section=1}}

==Ley Line Disorder==
* The Knave will apply Bonds of Life to characters.<br>After {{Color|help|clearing a Bond of Life}}, characters in your party will unleash a Scarlet Nighttide the next time one of their {{Color|help|Charged Attacks}} hit The Knave. This attack can {{Color|help|interrupt}} some of The Knave's attacks, including Bloodtide Banquet.<br>Some of The Knave's attacks will consume her own HP, and when these attacks hit a character, they will restore her own HP and apply a Bond of Life to the character; if the character hit already has a Bond of Life, the {{Color|help|DMG dealt by the attack will be increased yet more}}.
